item.description: blog cools https://nlpprogress.com/ https://www.ruder.io/ https://peltarion.com/blog/topic/nlp article cool https://arxiv.org/pdf/2204.14264.pdf jsp https://medium.com/dair-ai/relaunching-the-nlp-newsletter-1bd91106c7da https://thegradient.pub/ https://thegradient.pub/prompting/ difficulties Language distribution / limited Data / curse of multilinguality Homogeneity / Lack of pre-training data Over-representation of Western concepts Translation / Quality issues Multilingual evaluation Dependence on retrieval : It assumes there is a single gold paragraph providing the correct answer and does not consider information from other paragraphs or pages.
